Fucking hell how have I missed this gem for so damn long, finally an NTR story that actually has good plot and one where I don't hate the MC for being a wuss but instead actually stood up to save the love of his life. Also this is the first NTR revenge story I've read that actually has a well written bad guy that I can hate very much. Need more stories like this, thanks Akino-sensei!

The mc made the right choice not abandoning her when he got cucked

The artist for this story wasn't being fair to the rich guy. He showed fmc and mc inner thoughts but left out the rich guy's inner thoughts. But if we read the context of what the rich guy said and behave in the story, he is indeed very much in love with fmc.

After reading the story in full, the rich guy is actually in love with fmc. He's a spoiled kid who doesn't know how to show his love properly. He thought being possessive is showing his love. It's obvious that he wanted fmc for himself only. He's not planning to play & throw her away. At one point of the story when they were in the car, he even asked her why he wasn't good enough for her? That she's set for a rich life if she marries him. And the last page of him exposed in front of everyone, he actually showed the face of a guy losing the love of his life to another one. He actually didn't care about the exposed. It seemed that he actually got her first then mc came into fmc's life. Because mc is more gentle and showed his love properly, fmc fell in love with mc instead. So if the rich guy showed his love properly for once, he actually will get fmc himself instead. So this story is in fact NTR. The rich guy got NTR by mc.
